text: As if attending the premiere of ` ` Star Wars : The Last Jedi'' wasn't cool enough, for a few select guests, the really amazing part came after the screening. To cap off an already - magical night, famous faces poured into none other than Kensington Palace for a star - studded after - party. A spokesman for the palace said that the royal family did not fund the event and it was held on the palace's public grounds. Prince Harry and Prince William, of course, live in Kensington Palace along with the Duchess of Cambridge and several other royal figures. Interestingly, reports emerged that the princes in fact did not attend the party, despite their involvement in the film and their presence at the premiere.
